roleset.name: become undense
roleset.note: DISSIPATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dissipate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4. (from dissipate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually ergative
example.text: But Darman suggests such tensions will dissipate quickly.

example.name: non-agentive arg0
example.text: [The tremendous energy of the quake]-1 was dissipated [*-1]by the distance, so that most parts of the valley and the major cities suffered largely cosmetic damage -- broken windows, falling brick and cornices, buckled asphalt or sidewalks.
example.arg: so that most parts of the valley and the major cities suffered largely cosmetic damage -- broken windows, falling brick and cornices, buckled asphalt or sidewalks
